item.title: Need some to help me add emote commands please help
item.dc:creator: @firewatcher0 firewatcher0
item.description:
@firewatcher0 wrote:

search for

// headbang

you should see this underneath

if(emotes == 0) { emotes = 1; pEmote = 0x83D; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

replace it with this

if(emotes == 0) { teleportToX = 2740; teleportToY = 2791; inwildy = false; sendMessage("welcome"); }[br][size=1]Posted at: December 22, 2006, 03:53:07 PM[/size][hr]dunno how to replace the name tho so just click headbang when u get on your server

Read full topic
